title: Orange and chicory salad
ingredients: ['Salad', '500g chicory', '1 orange', 'Dressing', '1 tablespoon vinegar or lemon juice', '1/2 teaspoon salt', 'freshly ground black pepper', '1/2 tablespoon mustard', '1/2 garlic clove, finely minced', 'mixed fresh herbs to taste, finely chopped', '1/2 mug cream', '1/2 mug creme fraiche']
